survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Grocery Shopping Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer experiences and satisfaction levels with contactless grocery shopping services, focusing on ease of use, reliability, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to measure frequency of use. Ensure options cover all potential usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Which features do you value most in contactless grocery shopping? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key value drivers. Limit selections to prioritize responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max selection = 3

script.question_text: Which features do you value most in contactless grocery shopping? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the overall contactless grocery shopping experience? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Likert scale question to measure satisfaction. Ensure balanced scale with clear anchors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with horizontal scale

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the overall contactless grocery shopping experience? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would enhance your contactless grocery shopping experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Set character limit to 500.

script.question_text: What improvements would enhance your contactless grocery shopping experience?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend contactless grocery shopping to others?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'First time user' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question. Exclude first-time users for accurate recommendation data.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with skip logic for Q1 = 'First time user'

script.question_text: Would you recommend contactless grocery shopping to others?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who answered 'First time user' in Q1
